name: Psoglav
description: The Psoglav is a large fiend with exceptional agility and strength, characterized by its ability to control shadows and turn itself invisible, making it a stealthy ambusher.
memorable: It can control shadows and use them to summon additional threats, causing chaos in battle.
goals: To ambush and confuse opponents while maintaining control over shadows.
relations: May be encountered with other fiends or shadowy creatures it commands.
environment: Typically found in shadowy or dark environments where it can utilize its invisibility and shadow control.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity, strong melee damage through Bite attacks, and resistance to various damage types.
weaknesses: Reliance on melee and need to maintain concentration on abilities, potentially exploited by clever tactics.
attacks: Three melee Bite attacks per turn, dealing significant piercing damage with the potential to ambush.
most_powerful_ability: Shadow-Stealing Ray, which allows it to control the shadows of its enemies and summon additional shadow creatures.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet enables it to detect creatures without needing light.
skills: High proficiency in Stealth, Acrobatics, Intimidation, and Perception makes it a highly capable combatant.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Ability to turn invisible until it attacks or uses special abilities.
Can Shadow Jump, enhancing its mobility in combat.
test_queries: large chaotic evil monster with invisibility
creature that controls shadows in combat
ambush monster that attacks with teeth
